description: Documentation for 9.7.16.9. Tensor Memory Data Movement Instructions

directories.name: 971691_optional_decompression
directories.description: Optionally, during the copy, a vector of 4-bit and 6-bit custom floating point types can be decompressed into 8-bit types.

files.title: Overview
files.summary: Data from the shared memory can be copied asynchronously to the [Tensor Memory](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tensor-memory) using the [Tensorcore 5th Generation Instructions: tcgen05.cp](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-instructions-tcgen0...
